column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column167: Hold: Grasping the wind's might, you form a vortex of vacuum in your palm, causing continuous Anemo DMG to opponents in front of you. The vacuum vortex explodes when the skill duration ends, causing a greater amount of Anemo DMG over a larger area.
column168: Elemental Absorption: DMG and AoE will gradually increase.
column346: Slitting Wind: The last hit of a Normal Attack combo unleashes a wind blade, dealing 60% of ATK as Anemo DMG to all opponents in its path.
column347: Second Wind: Palm Vortex kills regenerate 2% HP for 5s. This effect can only occur once every 5s.
column348: Raging Vortex: Palm Vortex pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.
column349: Uprising Whirlwind: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.
column350: Sweeping Gust: Increases the Level of Gust Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column351: Cherishing Breezes: Reduces DMG taken while casting Palm Vortex by 10%.
column352: Vortex Stellaris: Increases the Level of Palm Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column353: Intertwined Winds: Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
